name: LIGHT NIGHT BOARDGAME
description:
You three brave heroes! Warrior, mage and necromancer! You descended into deep, gloomy and damp dungeons in search of profit! Get ready to fight terrible monsters, avoid dangerous traps and collect valuable treasures! And remember, the blacksmith is always ready to help you as long as you have gold...

Light Night is an unusual Roguelike where you have to control 3 heroes at once! Combine their abilities, save them in dangerous situations and clear floors.
